job.title: Machine Learning Engineer/Python
job.description: <strong><u>Job Description<br><br></u></strong>A financial company that originally began in the NYC area has expanded their operations to the West Coast, specifically Irvine, CA. They’re looking for a Mid-level Machine Learning Engineer. The company itself helps to provide personalized financial services and options to small businesses. They have created a unique technology platform that is also offered to clients along with their notable customer service.<br><br>The candidate must have at least 2 years of experience in Machine Learning/Data Engineering. You will be an integral part of the team while working closely with the Director of Analytics as well as other members of the team. This candidate <strong><u>must</u></strong> be local to the Orange County area and unfortunately cannot provide sponsorship at this time.<br><br><strong><u>Required Skills &amp; Experience<br></u></strong><ul><li>Bachelors degree in Statistics/Analytics/Computer Science or related field</li><li>A minimum of 2 years of experience</li><li>Local to OC/LA area</li><li>Most experience writing production/deployment code using R/Python</li><li>Develop deep learning models<br></li></ul><strong><u>Desired Skills &amp; Experience<br></u></strong><ul><li>Experience in classification, detection, segmentation</li><li>More than 2+ years of experience<br></li></ul>What You Will Be Doing<br><br>Tech Breakdown<br><ul><li>50% Coding</li><li>50% Modeling<br></li></ul>Daily Responsibilities<br><ul><li>70% Hands On</li><li>30% Team Collaboration<br></li></ul>The Offer<br><ul><li>Competitive Salary: Up to $150K/year, DOE<br></li></ul><strong><u>You Will Receive The Following Benefits<br></u></strong><ul><li>Medical Insurance &amp; Health Savings Account (HSA)</li><li>401(k)</li><li>Paid Sick Time Leave</li><li>Pre-tax Commuter Benefit<br></li></ul>Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States on a full-time basis now and in the future<br><br><strong>Posted By:</strong> Niki Strutzel
